underlying_goal: To replace the greedy Vendi diversity selection algorithm with an optimal, exhaustive search version.
primary_success: Implemented an optimal, exhaustive-search version of the Vendi diversity selection algorithm, complete with performance benchmarks and new unit tests, to replace a suboptimal greedy version.
brief_summary: The user requested to change the Vendi diversity selection from a greedy to an optimal algorithm. Claude implemented the new function using an exhaustive combination search, updated the pipelines to use it, benchmarked its performance, added thorough unit tests, and committed the work.
